skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.primitives.ExtractVictims
skill.description:
To extract wounded victims contained in a set of a given "VictimsUnits".
When several "VictimsUnit" should be extracted, the agent acts on each unit by following the order of the elements into the 'victimsUnits' list.
Wounded human victims won't be extracted if: - 'victimsUnit' is not reached (it has moved away or it is localized in a non accessible urban block) - 'victimsUnit' does not have wounded humans.

parameter.name: victimsUnits
parameter.description: The set of units to extract victims from.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" a resource node.

link.name: extractVictims
link.description: To enact the decision to make victims extracted.

feedback.name: extracted
feedback.description: Sent each time a set of victims within each "victimsUnit"have been extracted.

feedback.name: notExtracted
feedback.description: Sent each time a set of victims within each "victimsUnit" cannot be extracted.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "victimsUnits" have been visited.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "victimsUnits" is empty (no "victimsUnits" to act on).
